title: Payment Gateway Integration Guide
content:
# Payment Gateway Integration Guide

## Overview
Complete guide for integrating with our payment processing system.

## Supported Payment Methods
- Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, MC, Amex, Discover)
- PayPal
- Apple Pay / Google Pay
- Bank Transfers

## API Endpoints

### Process Payment
POST /api/v1/payments/process
{
  "order_id": "ORD-123",
  "payment_method": "credit_card",
  "amount": 99.99,
  "currency": "USD",
  "payment_token": "tok_xxxxx"
}

### Refund Payment
POST /api/v1/payments/refund
{
  "transaction_id": "TXN-456",
  "amount": 99.99
}

## Security
- PCI DSS Level 1 compliant
- TLS 1.3 encryption
- Tokenization for card storage
- 3D Secure authentication

## Error Handling
- 400: Bad Request
- 402: Payment Required
- 403: Fraud Detected
- 500: Gateway Error

## Testing
Use test card: 4111111111111111
Test CVV: 123
Test Expiry: 12/25
